author: bmarzocc
body:
PR description:

This PR is needed for the ECAL Run3 clustering studies. In this PR I change the dataformat of the simClusters, which are used for producing the caloParticle collection. Once this is merged, a central production of samples will be asked. For the moment I ask the PR into 11_0_X  CMSSW, but please let me know if you want this PR on the master or some other branches.

Badder
title: Pr 11 x calo particles
